snippet: The vote was seen not just as a hard-fought victory for gay-rights advocates, but as part of a broader shift in public opinion.
abstract: Illinois Senate approves bill that would legalize same-sex marriage; it is unclear when House will take up legislation.
lead_paragraph: The vote was seen not just as a hard-fought victory for gay-rights advocates, but as part of a broader shift in public opinion.

headline.seo: Illinois Senate Approves Same-Sex Marriage Bill
headline.main: Illinois Senate Votes to Back Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: Illinois Senate Votes to Back Gay Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
